name: Hexahedral Squasher
description:
You are a dice. You do be rolling.

6 distinct faces! 6 distinct corresponding attack patterns and damage values! Squash enemies! Squash'em against walls! Squash'em against other enemies! Shield yourself and overcome an impossible siege!

Also nothing is random in this game! Everything is strategy!

Enjoy :D

GMTK2022 Submission
